mapper.select:
select a.scheme_id, a.scheme_name, a.city, a.scheme_type, (select count(*) from `wk_hrm_employee_social_security_info` d left join `wk_hrm_employee` e on d.employee_id = e.employee_id where d.scheme_id = a.scheme_id and e.is_del = 0 ) as use_count,
from `wk_hrm_insurance_scheme` a where a.is_del = 0 order by a.create_time desc
mapper.sql: (select sum(personal_amount) from `wk_hrm_insurance_project` b where b.scheme_id = a.scheme_id and b.type not in (10,11)) as personal_insurance_amount, (select sum(personal_amount) from `wk_hrm_insurance_project` c where c.scheme_id = a.scheme_id and c.type in (10,11)) as personal_provident_fund_amount, (select sum(corporate_amount) from `wk_hrm_insurance_project` b where b.scheme_id = a.scheme_id and b.type not in (10,11)) as corporate_insurance_amount, (select sum(corporate_amount) from `wk_hrm_insurance_project` c where c.scheme_id = a.scheme_id and c.type in (10,11)) as corporate_provident_fund_amount
